docs.lead_paragraph: An all-out effort to develop a vaccine against the virus disease rubella is being made by Government, industry and university scientists, the director of one of the National Institutes of Health said here yesterday.

headline.main: DRIVE ON TO CURB GERMAN MEASLES; Search for Vaccine Pressed Because of Birth Defects

docs.abstract: Dr R L Masland repts all-out effort by US Govt, indus and univs to develop vaccine
docs.snippet: An all-out effort to develop a vaccine against the virus disease rubella is being made by Government, industry and university scientists, the director of one of the National Institutes of Health said here yesterday.
